docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS N.Y., July 1 -- After a hiatus during the two preceding years, expansion of world beef production resumed in 1960 so markedly that a new record was established, as indicated by statistics of the Food and Agriculture Organization.

headline.main: BEEF PRODUCTION SOARS IN WORLD; Output for 1960 at Record After a Two-Year Lag
